attributes.review: I wanted to see my daddy trump but I was sadly mislead. 😿when I opened the app I was met by an Oompa Loompa that stared me cold in the eyes. 👁👄👁When I looked at him, he told me he to stay away because I have the “China virus” I’m not even Chinese 😿. And then he leans in and says “are you lost baby gorl?” 😼This made me highly uncomfortable so I left the app. I highly do not recommend, trump makes you feel very uncomfortable once you even open the app! 😟please never use this app!!!! 😾
attributes.title: No ❤️

attributes.review: So I wanted to learn about fuzzy popsicles but all doneld trump talked about was him self and other crap I did not need to know about and I want him to get impeached because he is the worst president I have heard of and seen in my life and I need information that will Help me and I can use to teach me almost born son who will be in this world in another 3 months and I don’t want him to grow up knowing that this vile person is running are country.
attributes.title: This is the worst app ever 🤬

attributes.review: I wish I could give this a lower rating, but honestly what would you expect from a walking, racist tangerine. Completely glitches when you try to do something a decent human would do and messed up your entire phone system. It’s also really sensitive, it doesn’t like being put in a folder and not being the center of attention. Do not install unless you want an enormous ego just like Tr*mp.
attributes.title: Complete garbage

attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review: This app literally made my phone enter an eternal deep sleep :( I don’t know what to do!!! it has been infected. i think it is spreading covid. it is so gross. it literally smells so bad i keep getting really rude stares from people.... please do not ever download this app if you want to keep your phone and your dignity. i am so sad. so very sad. worst app i’ve ever downloaded on my phone. very rude. anyone who tells you otherwise is a racist communist spreading fake news! do not download!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app literally killed my phone! I’m not joking, I had to buy another phone after getting this app because it destroyed my battery and made it all sick and glitchy and it was a total mistake getting it wasn’t even that nice of an app it just used up my data. I would’ve given it ZERO STARS but you can’t do that so all I can do is write a review. Also get this app and download then write a bad review it will be worth it!!!!
attributes.title: THIS APP GAVE MY PHONE CORONAVIRUS

attributes.review: I happily downloaded this app to reserve my tickets to the upcoming rally but then it started glitching like CRAZY it was taking me out then i had a blank screen it started lagging and going back and forth between sections. This app is a total mess they need to take this off it makes me really upset that I have to deal with this and apparently every body else too. I am mad I wanted to go to that rally so bad now I can’t because of this broken app. Ugh.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, my other accounts began being hacked and signed into by people in China. To make matters worse, I noticed that my call log was showing that I was making calls to random numbers which is a huge sign that my phone in general was hacked...if there’s any app that is giving our information to China it’s this one. If you value your safety at all DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.title: I would give zero stars if I could...

attributes.review: Right when I downloaded this app.. my phone started glitching so much. But I didn’t completely know that it was the app making it glitch. So I decided to test my theory. I went and got my old phone to test the theory. Right when I downloaded it my phone started to glitch. DO NOT GET THE APP I WOULD HATE FOR THIS TO HAPPEN TO ANYONE ELSE. Also when I deleted the app most of the glitching went away. But.... my phone kept glitching to the point I had to get a new one. PLEASE DONT GET THIS APP...
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😡😡

attributes.review: i downloaded this app last night and this morning when i got out of bed my kneecaps were gone! i crawled to my car and drove to the hospital and they diagnosed me with “trumpdeletedyourkneecapsitis”, a chronic and incurable disease. i’ll have to be in a wheelchair for the rest of my life now. trying to be an optimist, i told myself that at least i could go home to my precious cat but alas when i got there he was shaved and looked like a rotisserie chicken. he had cuts all over him from the razor so i had to take him to the vet and they diagnosed him with “trumpshavedyourcatitis”, also incurable. so now i have to live with a chronic disease and a ball sac- looking cat. i recommend not downloading this app 😡😡
attributes.title: this app will shave your cat and delete your kneecaps
